sentences.sentence: This painting is indisputably one of his finest works.
sentences.translation: 这幅画无疑是他最好的作品之一。

sentences.sentence: This universal consistency among education experts indisputably demonstrates an immutable principle of learning: initiative and correct methods are fundamental to academic success.
sentences.translation: 教育专家的这种普遍共识无可争辩地证明了一个不可改变的学习原则：主动性和正确的方法是学术上成功的基础。

sentences.sentence: Indisputably, the world will continue to need more fuel.
sentences.translation: 无疑，世界仍将需要更多的能源。
